meanings.sent1: The machine automatizes the process of sorting mail.
meanings.sent2: The new technology automatizes many tasks that used to be done by hand.
meanings.sent3: The robot automatizes its movements, making it look like a dance.
meanings.sent4: The software automatizes the repetitive tasks, freeing up time for more creative work.
meanings.sent5: The conveyor belt automatizes the production line, increasing efficiency.

meanings.definition: To operate or control by automation.
meanings.sent1: The system automatizes the temperature control in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent2: The smart home system automatizes the lighting based on the time of day.
meanings.sent3: The coffee maker automatizes the brewing process, ensuring a perfect cup every time.
meanings.sent4: The self-driving car automatizes the navigation, allowing passengers to relax during the journey.
meanings.sent5: The assembly line automatizes the car manufacturing process, reducing human error.
